status: Orchestrator session 141 resumed. Focus shifted to CLI tools evaluation per user directive. No new features, improve/debug/eval existing CLI tools only.
recent_achievements: Session 175: Session 181: Added auto-push to git_commit tool (default: true). User request addressed. Commit 516a98e.
Session 175: Session 180: Tested GH CLI integration (gh:issue, gh:branch, gh:sync). Found and fixed bug in gh:sync output - was showing old state after closing issue. Commit 3e406be.
Session 175: Session 179: Implemented GitHub CLI integration for task manager - gh:issue, gh:branch, gh:sync commands. Commit 389f5aa.

Session 174: Session 178: Fixed the REAL root cause of 4x duplicate logging - INSTANCE_ID was at module scope (shared by all 4 plugin instances). Moved it inside plugin function so each instance gets unique ID. Commit 1203ffc.

Session 174: Session 177: Fixed critical 4x duplicate logging bug by moving isPrimaryInstance() check inside log() function. Also fixed remaining ctx.$ shell redirect error (2 commits: 1fb595a, d870c25). This completes a multi-session effort to fix the plugin logging issues.

achievements: Created OpenCode skills: agent-orchestrator and memory-manager
Fixed knowledge extraction tool - changed from bun x to node
